name: Finnish Pension Alliance TELA
goal:
The Finnish Pension Alliance TELA represents all pension alliances operating in Finland. We represent the whole branch within statutory earnings-related pension insurance.

Our main function is to confirm the earnings-related pension scheme, as well as influence in general operational environment of the branch. We also represent our members in order to protect, develop and strengthen the knowledge of statutory earnings-related pension schemes in the society.

Our tasks are:

trusteeship of the branch,
communications and
social education.

Our actions are based on diverse and intense expertise of the branch, good social networks and explicit communications. Our aim is that our trusteeship and communications are transparent, target-oriented and persistent.

We are a private association. Not a government or public function.
